original: @193a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @193a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa ma na yee bi she:/
analyzed: aa ma na yee bi she:/
translated: Āmnāyābhisamaya

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gdams ngag gi khyad par /
analyzed: gdams ngag gi khyad par /
translated: The Distinctive Pith Instructions

original: sa bon las ni 'od zer spro bya zhing //
analyzed: sa bon las ni 'od zer spro bya zhing //
translated: From the seed, one should emanate light rays,

original: de nas 'od zer rngub pa'i dbugs kyis so //
analyzed: de nas 'od zer rngub pa'i dbugs kyis so //
translated: And then, with the breath inhaling light rays.

original: dbugs 'byung sogs las ye shes sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung sogs las ye shes sems dpa' ni //
translated: From the exhalation and so forth, the gnosis being

original: sa bon las drangs legs par bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: sa bon las drangs legs par bsdu bar bya //
translated: Is drawn from the seed and well gathered.

original: sa bon las spro 'od ni kun bsdus la //
analyzed: sa bon las spro 'od ni kun bsdus la //
translated: From the seed, emanate light and gather it all,

original: ye shes sems dpa' la sogs ngal gso zhing //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' la sogs ngal gso zhing //
translated: Resting the gnosis being and so forth.

original: 'byung dang rngub pa dag ni rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'byung dang rngub pa dag ni rim pa bzhin //
translated: The exhalation and inhalation, in order,

original: dbugs gnas blo ni brtan pa nyid byas te //
analyzed: dbugs gnas blo ni brtan pa nyid byas te //
translated: Stabilize the breath and make the mind firm.

original: zla ba'i gzugs kyi steng gnas ral gri zla ba sa bon mchog ldan pa //
analyzed: zla ba'i gzugs kyi steng gnas ral gri zla ba sa bon mchog ldan pa //
translated: Above the form of the moon, the sword, moon, and supreme seed

original: rim gyis rtogs pa yongs su 'brel gyur zhu ba'i bdag nyid bdag rig cing //
analyzed: rim gyis rtogs pa yongs su 'brel gyur zhu ba'i bdag nyid bdag rig cing //
translated: Gradually connect with realization, melting into the nature of the self-knowing one.

original: de rjes la yang blo gros phung po 'jam pa'i dbyangs sogs gzugs yin no //
analyzed: de rjes la yang blo gros phung po 'jam pa'i dbyangs sogs gzugs yin no //
translated: After that, the aggregate of intelligence is Mañjughoṣa and so forth.

original: blo dman la ni 'khor los sgyur sogs thar pa rab tu spyin pa'ang yin//
analyzed: blo dman la ni 'khor los sgyur sogs thar pa rab tu spyin pa'ang yin//
translated: For those of lesser intelligence, it is also the granting of liberation as a universal monarch and so forth.

original: zla bas bon ral gri'i chang zungs der //
analyzed: zla bas bon ral gri'i chang zungs der //
translated: The moon is the seed syllable of the sword, the handle of the cup.

original: zla ba'i sa bon nges par 'od 'phro ba'i //
analyzed: zla ba'i sa bon nges par 'od 'phro ba'i //
translated: The moon seed is definitely radiating light,

original: 'od kyis byas pa'i spro dang bsdu bar ni //🔽lha lnga po rnams bsam par bya ba yin //
analyzed: 'od kyis byas pa'i spro dang bsdu bar ni // lha lnga po rnams bsam par bya ba yin //
translated: which is the light that is the emanation and reabsorption🔽of the five deities.

original: lha lnga'i khyad par gyi gdams ngag aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: lha lnga'i khyad par gyi gdams ngag aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: The special instructions on the five deities were translated by Śīlapāl[aditya].
